content.title: Thank you for your support! Next step: production start-up and address confirmation
content.creator:
OdinLake
February 21, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We’re excited to share the latest progress on our campaign! Currently, we’re awaiting the transfer of funds from Kickstarter, which typically takes up to two weeks to process.
Once the funds are received, we will immediately commence production to bring your rewards to life. Shortly after production begins, we’ll send out the shipping address survey via PledgeBox to ensure your rewards reach you smoothly.
Rest assured, we’ll keep you updated every step of the way. Thank you for your continued patience and support!
Best regards,
